title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT COUNCIL (MDC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025-07, DATED AUGUST 15, 2025 ENTITLED ”RESOLUTION REPROGRAMMING SOME PORTIONS OF THE 2098 MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT FUND  CY 2025 CONTINUING APPROPRIATIONS AMOUNTING TO FOURTEEN MILLION NINE HUNDRED TWENTY-TWO THOUSAND NINETY-NINE PESOS AND 48/100 (PHP 14,922,099.48) FOR VARIOUS PURPOSES AND APPROVING THE SAME.” Author H
